post:
**ClickVPS.net** offers **affordable** VPS servers with **great features** and **good performance**. Just basic servers, without add-ons or services you don't need, and **with the prices you want to pay**.

![](http://www.clickvps.net/static/logo.png)

[https://www.clickvps.net/](https://www.clickvps.net/)

Our brand represents a division of Andrino Telecom, a small but well stablished company based in Spain that provides professional internet services, backed by a passionate team of people with years of experience running servers, so even if you're buying a budget VPS hosting service, you won't be dealing with a shady, unreliable one-man company.

★☆★ **LIMITED LIFETIME OFFER!!! – 7-Day Money-Back Guarantee** ★☆★

**ClickVPS Model S**  
1GB RAM  
1x vCPU  
25GB SSD  
1TB Traffic  
1Gbps Port   
/64 Native IPv6 + 1x IPv4    
Location: The Netherlands, EU  
**€3,74 EUR /month**  
PROMO: LAUNCH25LEB  
**[ORDER NOW](https://my.clickvps.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)**

★☆★ **All plans include** ★☆★

- 7-Day Money-Back Guarantee
- Instant setup
- Debian, CentOS, Ubuntu & Fedora available
- Unlimited remote OS reinstalls
- Reverse DNS
- TUN/TAP & PPP Allowed
- Dual-Stack IPv4 + IPv6 native network
- Daily automated backups
- Self Managed
- Enterprise grade hardware
- Redundant network
- OpenVZ container technology
- RAID 1/10 SSD storage
- Secure facility

★☆★ **Looking Glass & Speedtest** ★☆★

*Test IP:* 91.243.75.15  
*Speedtest 100M:* [http://amsnl.lg.clickvps.net/100MB.test](http://amsnl.lg.clickvps.net/100MB.test)

★☆★ **FAQ** ★☆★

** *No way, I'm missing something out. Why is it so cheap!?!?* **  
We know that many things usually included with a VPS service are unnecessary for a tiny non-critical server.  
You might need a server for testing your new web app, monitoring your other servers, or hosting your personal website, and you want it to be as affordable as possible.  
And because we've launched this brand recently, we want everyone to know how great our services are!

** *What virtualization technology you use?* **  
We use OpenVZ as container-based virtualization technology, which provides proper isolation and almost zero overhead by sharing the same kernel.

** *How can I pay?* **  
We accept all major Credit/Debit cards such as Visa, MasterCard and American Express. We also accept PayPal.

** *I need something better for my production projects. Can you help me?* **  
Sure we can! While ClickVPS.net is suitable for development or staging projects, we also provide enterprise level services under our main brand Andrino Telecom for your production needs.  
Drop us a line at support(at)andrinotelecom.net and we will be happy to help you! :)


★☆★ **More questions?** ★☆★  
We're happy to help! Contact us at support(at)clickvps.net :) !
